name: Snake-Eye Birch
effectText: If you control a FIRE monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Snake-Eye Birch" once per turn this way. During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can send 2 face-up cards you control to the GY, including this card; Special Summon 1 "Snake-Eye" monster from your hand or Deck, except "Snake-Eye Birch". You can only use this effect of "Snake-Eye Birch" once per turn.
